languages.text: "Ради этого я прибыл. В этой обители меня ждут".
"It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."
languages.original_text: "Ради этого я прибыл. В этой обители меня ждут".

traits.locale_text: "It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."
"It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."
"It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."
"It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."
"It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."

languages.text: "Deshalb bin ich zu dieser Welt gereist. Ich werde dort erwartet."
languages.original_text: "It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."

traits.locale_text: "Deshalb bin ich zu dieser Welt gereist. Ich werde dort erwartet."

languages.text: « C'est la raison de ma présence sur ce monde. On m'attend là-bas. »
languages.original_text: "It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la raison de ma présence sur ce monde. On m'attend là-bas. »

languages.text: “我来这个世界就是为了去那间修道院，有人在那里等我。”
languages.original_text: "It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."

traits.locale_text: “我来这个世界就是为了去那间修道院，有人在那里等我。”

languages.text: 「それが私がこの惑星へ来た理由だからだ。そこで私を待っている者がいる」
languages.original_text: "It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."

traits.locale_text: 「それが私がこの惑星へ来た理由だからだ。そこで私を待っている者がいる」

languages.text: «Me necesitan allí, por eso vine a este mundo».
languages.original_text: "It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."

traits.locale_text: «Me necesitan allí, por eso vine a este mundo».

languages.text: "Bu dünyaya geliş amacım bu. Orada olmam şart."
languages.original_text: "It is why I came to this world. I am expected there."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyaya geliş amacım bu. Orada olmam şart."
